summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6657 for the improvement of an EASEMENT, across private property in the production west of WEST GALER STREET from 32nd Avenue West to Clise Place West; and certain other easements; to the construction of sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenance; and otherwise improving the same; providing for the acquisition of the right of way necessary therefor.
